message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am currently working within a budget of $1200000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to this amount?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1320000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
